description: Bridges: Type should be defined for param `idLocale` in method `Spryker\Zed\UserLocale\Dependency\Facade\UserLocaleToLocaleFacadeBridge::getLocaleById()`.
Bridges: Method `getLocaleById()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.
Bridges: Type should be defined for param `localeName` in method `Spryker\Zed\UserLocale\Dependency\Facade\UserLocaleToLocaleFacadeBridge::getLocale()`.
Bridges: Method `getLocale()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.
Bridges: Method `getCurrentLocale()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.
Bridges: Method `getSupportedLocaleCodes()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `getLocaleById()`. Got `$idLocale` but expected to be `int $idLocale`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `getLocale()`. Got `$localeName` but expected to be `string $localeName`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
Bridges: Method `getAvailableLocales()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.
Bridges: Type should be defined for param `currentLocale` in method `Spryker\Zed\UserLocale\Dependency\Facade\UserLocaleToStoreBridge::setCurrentLocale()`.
Bridges: Method `getCurrentLocale()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.
Bridges: Method `getCurrentUser()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.
